title: Game crashed when loading into map after last nights update
body:
I sent in a report (actually, about 3) when it asked. Finally quit, restarted client, and it reported corrupted files and re-patched my game. So that's fine, it works now. However, I got placed into the low-priority queue as a result. Any chance of removing me from it? 10 minute wait per game is killer.

To boot, it was an AI game and my team were happily slaughtering bots without me. {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} 

E: Report numbers are:

148030372
148030379
148030394

replies.body: Hi, how did you fix it exactly ? The same thing happend to me, I waited for the update 6.15 to finish, I launched the game, I queue up for ranked and BOOM Bugsplat, I restart the client they tell me that there are corrupted files, I press OK to fix them but when I reconnect to play a costume game (Loq priority too) I get the bugsplat again.{{item:3151}}

Hey there,

Could you all try [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if that helps.

Same thing happening to me as well, it's the first time it ever happened to me. When i go in-game bugsplat then crashes. 
I exit then they say fix corrupted files, then after all that the process repeats again bugsplat into crash then fix corrupted file. Its prob this patch. {{item:3070}}
Nvm it got fixed, But the patch i received that made this work took very long.
